description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in the forbidden city.
description.schinese: 当你鉴别出紫禁城所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出紫禁城所有的千里馬。

displayName.english: Corner Tower of the Forbidden City

description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in the Corner Tower of the Forbidden City.
description.schinese: 当你鉴别出紫禁城角楼所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出紫禁城角樓所有的千里馬。

description.schinese: 当你鉴别出天坛所有的千里马。

description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出龍脊梯田所有的千里馬。

description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出深圳灣所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in Victoria Harbour.
description.schinese: 当你鉴别出维多利亚港所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出維多利亞港所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in the Ruins of St. Paul's.

description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出大三巴牌坊所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in Sun Moon Lake.
description.schinese: 当你鉴别出日月潭所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出日月潭所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you discern all the thousand-li horses in the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge.
description.schinese: 当你鉴别出港珠澳大桥所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你鑒別出港珠澳大橋所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you explore and savor every scenic spot and historical site and discern all the thousand-li horses in China.
description.schinese: 当你游遍览尽中国所有的风景名胜古迹并鉴别出中国所有的千里马。
description.tchinese: 當你遊遍覽盡中國所有的風景名勝古跡並鑒別出中國所有的千里馬。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "The Spirit of the Dragon-Horse".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“龙马精神”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“龍馬精神”的祝福。

displayName.english: Success With the Arrival of the Horse

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Success With the Arrival of the Horse".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“马到成功”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“馬到成功”的祝福。

displayName.english: Take the Lead as the Foremost Horse

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Take the Lead as the Foremost Horse".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“一马当先”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“一馬當先”的祝福。

displayName.english: Momentum as Majestic as Ten Thousand Horses Galloping

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Momentum as Majestic as Ten Thousand Horses Galloping".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“万马奔腾”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“萬馬奔騰”的祝福。

displayName.english: Compose Swiftly While Leaning Against a Horse

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Compose Swiftly While Leaning Against a Horse".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“倚马可待”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“倚馬可待”的祝福。

displayName.english: Gallantry in Splendid Attire upon Fiery Horses

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Gallantry in Splendid Attire upon Fiery Horses".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“鲜衣怒马”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“鮮衣怒馬”的祝福。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Ceaselessly Pressing Forward on Horseback".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“马不停蹄”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“馬不停蹄”的祝福。

displayName.english: Heavenly Horse Soaring Through the Skies

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Heavenly Horse Soaring Through the Skies".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“天马行空”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“天馬行空”的祝福。

displayName.english: Vast Plain Where a Horse Can Gallop Unobstructed

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Vast Plain Where a Horse Can Gallop Unobstructed".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“一马平川”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“一馬平川”的祝福。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Golden Horse and Jade Hall".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“金马玉堂”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“金馬玉堂”的祝福。

displayName.english: Old Horse in the Stable Still Cherishes the Ambition to Gallop a Thousand Li

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Old Horse in the Stable Still Cherishes the Ambition to Gallop a Thousand Li".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“老骥伏枥”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“老驥伏櫪”的祝福。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Bo Le Judging Horses".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“伯乐相马”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“伯樂相馬”的祝福。

displayName.english: Wield the Whip and Spur the Horse with Vigor and Resolve

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Wield the Whip and Spur the Horse with Vigor and Resolve".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“策马扬鞭”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“策馬揚鞭”的祝福。

displayName.english: Noble and Stalwart like the Dragon and Horse

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "Noble and Stalwart like the Dragon and Horse".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“龙神马壮”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“龍神馬壯”的祝福。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive Chinese New Year idiom: "National Prosperity and People's Well-being".
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁成语：“国泰民安”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲成語：“國泰民安”的祝福。

displayName.english: The old year departs amidst the crackle of firecrackers, the vernal breeze wafts warmth into the Tusu wine.
displayName.schinese: 爆竹声中一岁除，春风送暖入屠苏。
displayName.tchinese: 爆竹聲中一歲除，春風送暖入屠蘇。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese New Year poetry: "The old year departs amidst the crackle of firecrackers, the vernal breeze wafts warmth into the Tusu wine."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“爆竹声中一岁除，春风送暖入屠苏。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“爆竹聲中一歲除，春風送暖入屠蘇。”的祝福。

displayName.english: The Milky Way blazes in splendor, as if rising from the ocean's depths.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "The Milky Way blazes in splendor, as if rising from the ocean's depths."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“星汉灿烂，若出其里。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“星漢燦爛，若出其裏。”的祝福。

displayName.english: If one were to liken West Lake to Lady Xishi, she's always lovely, fresh and new whether dressed in light or heavy hues.
displayName.schinese: 欲把西湖比西子，淡妆浓抹总相宜。
displayName.tchinese: 欲把西湖比西子，淡妝濃抹總相宜。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "If one were to liken West Lake to Lady Xishi, she's always lovely, fresh and new whether dressed in light or heavy hues."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“欲把西湖比西子，淡妆浓抹总相宜。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“欲把西湖比西子，淡妝濃抹總相宜。”的祝福。

displayName.english: Boundless lotus leaves extend to the horizon in perpetual verdure, the lotus flowers reflecting the sun shine with an unusually vivid red.
displayName.schinese: 接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红。
displayName.tchinese: 接天蓮葉無窮碧，映日荷花別樣紅。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "Boundless lotus leaves extend to the horizon in perpetual verdure, the lotus flowers reflecting the sun shine with an unusually vivid red."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“接天蓮葉無窮碧，映日荷花別樣紅。”的祝福。

displayName.english: A profusion of blossoms gradually dazzles the eye, the tender grass just covers the horse's hooves.
displayName.schinese: 乱花渐欲迷人眼，浅草才能没马蹄。
displayName.tchinese: 亂花漸欲迷人眼，淺草才能沒馬蹄。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "A profusion of blossoms gradually dazzles the eye, the tender grass just covers the horse's hooves."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“乱花渐欲迷人眼，浅草才能没马蹄。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“亂花漸欲迷人眼，淺草才能沒馬蹄。”的祝福。

displayName.english: The sunset glow soars in unison with the solitary wild duck, the autumn waters blend with the vast sky into a single hue.
displayName.schinese: 落霞与孤鹜齐飞，秋水共长天一色。
displayName.tchinese: 落霞與孤鶩齊飛，秋水共長天一色。

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "The sunset glow soars in unison with the solitary wild duck, the autumn waters blend with the vast sky into a single hue."
description.schinese: 当你被恩赐中国贺岁古诗词：“落霞与孤鹜齐飞，秋水共长天一色。”的祝福。
description.tchinese: 當你被恩賜中國賀歲古詩詞：“落霞與孤鶩齊飛，秋水共長天一色。”的祝福。
